trans-unit.source: Describes the width, height, and location of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 描述矩形的寬度、高度和位置。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate location of the left side of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 左側的矩形的 x 座標位置。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate location of the top side of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 上方的矩形的 y 座標位置。

trans-unit.source: *width*
trans-unit.target: *width*

trans-unit.source: A non-negative value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 非負數值表示<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>的矩形。

trans-unit.source: *height*
trans-unit.target: *height*

trans-unit.source: A non-negative value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 非負數值表示<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure to specify the dimensions and location of a rectangle using XAML.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構，以指定的維度和使用 XAML 之矩形的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure that specifies the width and height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構，指定矩形的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure that is of the specified size and is located at (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是所指定的大小而且位在 (0,0)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure by using the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Size%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Size%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The first point that the new rectangle must contain.
trans-unit.target: 新矩形必須包含的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: The second point that the new rectangle must contain.
trans-unit.target: 新矩形必須包含的第二個點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure that is exactly large enough to contain the two specified points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構的新執行個體，這個執行個體剛好可以包含兩個指定的點。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure by using the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Windows.Point%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Windows.Point%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A point that specifies the location of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 指定矩形左上角之位置的點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure that specifies the width and height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構，指定矩形的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure that has the specified top-left corner location and the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的左上角位置和指定的寬度及高度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure by using the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Windows.Size%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Windows.Size%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The first point the rectangle must contain.
trans-unit.target: 矩形必須包含的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 要位移 (Offset) 所指定點的數量。

trans-unit.source: The resulting rectangle will be exactly large enough to contain both points.
trans-unit.target: 產生的矩形剛好可以包含兩個點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure that is exactly large enough to contain the specified point and the sum of the specified point and the specified vector.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構的新執行個體，這個執行個體剛好可以包含指定的點以及所指定點和所指定向量的總和。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure by using the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Windows.Vector%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Windows.Vector%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure that has the specified x-coordinate, y-coordinate, width, and height.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的 X 座標、Y 座標、寬度和高度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure by using the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.%23ctor%28System.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="width" /> is a negative value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="width" /> 是負值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="height" /> is a negative value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="height" /> 是負值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-axis value of the bottom of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得矩形底端的 Y 軸值。

trans-unit.source: The y-axis value of the bottom of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形底端的 Y 軸值。

trans-unit.source: If the rectangle is empty, the value is <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> .
trans-unit.target: 如果矩形是空的，則值為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />。

trans-unit.source: The y-axis value of the bottom of the rectangle is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 將矩形的底部的 y 軸值的總和等於<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the bottom-left corner of the rectangle
trans-unit.target: 取得矩形左下角的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the bottom-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左下角的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the bottom-left corner of the rectangle is equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> + <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 矩形的左下角的位置會等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> + <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得矩形右下角的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形右下角的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle is equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> + <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> + <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 矩形右下角的位置會等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> + <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> + <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the rectangle contains the specified point or rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形是否包含指定的點或矩形。

trans-unit.source: The point to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的點。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the rectangle contains the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形是否包含指定的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rectangle contains the specified point; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩形包含指定的點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Contains%28System.Windows.Point%29> method to determine if the rectangle contains the specified <xref:System.Windows.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Contains%28System.Windows.Point%29>方法，以判斷是否包含指定的矩形<xref:System.Windows.Point>。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the rectangle contains the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形是否包含指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="rect" /> is entirely contained by the rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩形整個包含 <paramref name="rect" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Contains%28System.Windows.Rect%29> method to determine if one rectangle is contained by another rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Contains%28System.Windows.Rect%29>方法來判斷是否由另一個矩形包含一個矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查之點的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查之點的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the rectangle contains the specified x-coordinate and y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形是否包含指定的 X 座標和 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) is contained by the rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩形包含 (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Contains%28System.Double%2CSystem.Double%29> method to determine if the rectangle contains the point specified by the given x-coordinate and y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Contains%28System.Double%2CSystem.Double%29>方法，以判斷矩形是否包含指定的給定的 x 座標和 y 座標的點。

trans-unit.source: Gets a special value that represents a rectangle with no position or area.
trans-unit.target: 取得特殊值，這個值表示沒有位置或區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The empty rectangle, which has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Y" /> property values of <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />, and has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Height" /> property values of <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: 空白矩形 (<see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Y" /> 屬性值為 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Height" /> 屬性值為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />)。

trans-unit.source: Avoid mathematical computations involving empty rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 避免空白矩形的算術運算。

trans-unit.source: Because both <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> are infinite values, processor operations are severely impaired by these operations.
trans-unit.target: 因為同時<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>是無限值，作業會造成嚴重受損這些作業的處理器。

trans-unit.source: Comparisons involving these values will not affect application performance.
trans-unit.target: 包含這些值的比較不會影響應用程式的效能。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two rectangles are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示兩個矩形是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前矩形相比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的物件是否等於目前矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> and has the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Size" /> values as the current rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 而且具有與目前矩形相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Size" /> 值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation tests for object equality.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會測試物件相等。

trans-unit.source: In this comparison, two instances of <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType> are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 這項比較，兩個執行個體<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>會被視為相等。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle's position and dimensions are described by <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 會描述矩形的位置和維度<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數時操作時，邏輯上相等的兩個值之間的比較可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Equals%28System.Object%29> method to determine if a rectangle is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Equals%28System.Object%29>方法來決定矩形是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to compare to the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前矩形相比較的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified rectangle is equal to the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的矩形是否等於目前矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified rectangle has the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Size" /> values as the current rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的矩形具有與目前矩形相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Size" /> 值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation tests for object equality.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會測試物件相等。

trans-unit.source: In this comparison, two instances of <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType> are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 這項比較，兩個執行個體<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>會被視為相等。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle's position and dimensions are described by <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 會描述矩形的位置和維度<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數時操作時，邏輯上相等的兩個值之間的比較可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Equals%28System.Windows.Rect%29> method to determine if a rectangle is equal to a specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Equals%28System.Windows.Rect%29>方法來決定矩形是否等於指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The first rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個矩形。

trans-unit.source: The second rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個矩形。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified rectangles are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的矩形是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rectangles have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Size" /> values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩形具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Size" /> 值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 這項作業會測試物件相等。

trans-unit.source: In this comparison, two instances of <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType> are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 這項比較，兩個執行個體<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>會被視為相等。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle's position and dimensions are described by <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 會描述矩形的位置和維度<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Double>值可能會遺失有效位數時操作時，邏輯上相等的兩個值之間的比較可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Equals%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Rect%29> method to determine if one rectangle is equal to another.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Equals%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Rect%29>方法，以判斷是否等於另一個矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code for the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a hash code by using the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會藉由建立雜湊程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.GetHashCode%2A> method to get the hash code of a <xref:System.Windows.Rect>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.GetHashCode%2A>方法來取得的雜湊碼<xref:System.Windows.Rect>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: A positive number that represents the height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形高度的正數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> rectangle has a <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> of <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>矩形<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>的<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> rectangle is read-only; its <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> cannot not be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>矩形是唯讀，則其<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>不變更。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構，以指定的維度和使用 XAML 之矩形的位置。

trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Height" /> is set to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Height" /> 設為負數值。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Height" /> 是在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形上設定。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that results from expanding or shrinking a rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 建立將矩形展開或壓縮所指定的數量而產生的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount to expand the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 指定展開矩形的數量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> property specifies the amount to increase the rectangle's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Right" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> 屬性會指定增加矩形 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Right" /> 屬性的數量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> property specifies the amount to increase the rectangle's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Top" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> 屬性會指定增加矩形 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Top" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom" /> 屬性的數量。

trans-unit.source: Expands the rectangle by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />, in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 往所有方向展開矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased by twice the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Size> structure, because both the left and right sides of the rectangle are inflated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>產生的矩形的增加了兩次<xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>指定<xref:System.Windows.Size>結構，因為左邊和右邊的矩形會膨脹。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased by twice the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Size> structure.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>產生的矩形的增加了兩次<xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>指定<xref:System.Windows.Size>結構。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Windows.Size%29> method to increase the size of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Windows.Size%29>方法，以增加之矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: This method is called on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to expand or shrink the left and right sides of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 用來展開或壓縮矩形左右兩邊的數量。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to expand or shrink the top and bottom sides of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 用來展開或壓縮矩形上下兩邊的數量。

trans-unit.source: Expands or shrinks the rectangle by using the specified width and height amounts, in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 使用所指定寬度和高度數量，往所有方向展開或壓縮矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased or decreased by twice the specified width offset, because it is applied to both the left and right sides of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>的產生的矩形會增加或減少指定的寬度位移的兩倍，因為它會套用至左邊和右邊的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased or decreased by twice the specified height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>的產生的矩形會增加或減少兩次指定的高度。

trans-unit.source: If the specified width or height shrink the rectangle by more than its current <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>—giving the rectangle a negative area—the rectangle becomes the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的寬度或高度壓縮矩形大於其目前<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>— 負的區域中，提供矩形，矩形會變成<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>矩形。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Double%2CSystem.Double%29> method to change the size of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Double%2CSystem.Double%29>方法，以變更矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: This method is called on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount to expand the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 指定展開矩形的數量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> property specifies the amount to increase the rectangle's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Right" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> 屬性會指定增加矩形 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Right" /> 屬性的數量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> property specifies the amount to increase the rectangle's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Top" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> 屬性會指定增加矩形 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Top" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom" /> 屬性的數量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that results from expanding the specified rectangle by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />, in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回矩形，這個矩形是以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 往所有方向展開所指定矩形而產生的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The resulting rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 產生的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased by twice the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Size> structure, because both the left and right sides of the rectangle are inflated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>產生的矩形的增加了兩次<xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>指定<xref:System.Windows.Size>結構，因為左邊和右邊的矩形會膨脹。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased by twice the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Size> structure.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>產生的矩形的增加了兩次<xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>指定<xref:System.Windows.Size>結構。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Size%29> method to change the size of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Size%29>方法，以變更矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rect" /> is an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rect" /> 是一種 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to expand or shrink the left and right sides of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 用來展開或壓縮矩形左右兩邊的數量。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to expand or shrink the top and bottom sides of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 用來展開或壓縮矩形上下兩邊的數量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that results from expanding or shrinking the specified rectangle by the specified width and height amounts, in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形，這個矩形是以指定的寬度和高度數量往所有方向展開或壓縮指定的矩形而產生的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The resulting rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 產生的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased or decreased by twice the specified width offset, because it is applied to both the left and right sides of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>的產生的矩形會增加或減少指定的寬度位移的兩倍，因為它會套用至左邊和右邊的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> of the resulting rectangle is increased or decreased by twice the specified height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>的產生的矩形會增加或減少兩次指定的高度。

trans-unit.source: If the specified width or height modifiers shrink the rectangle by more than its current <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>—giving the rectangle a negative area—this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的寬度或高度修飾詞壓縮矩形大於其目前<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>— 提供負區域的矩形，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Inflate%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%29>方法，以變更矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rect" /> is an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rect" /> 是一種 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形。

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of two rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 尋找兩個矩形的交集。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to intersect with the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 與目前矩形交集的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of the current rectangle and the specified rectangle, and stores the result as the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 尋找目前矩形與所指定矩形的交集，並將結果儲存為目前的矩形。

trans-unit.source: If no intersection exists, the current rectangle becomes <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有交集存在，就會變成目前的矩形<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Intersect%28System.Windows.Rect%29> method to find the intersection of two rectangles and store the result as a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Intersect%28System.Windows.Rect%29>方法來尋找兩個矩形的交集，並將結果儲存為矩形。

trans-unit.source: The first rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個矩形。

trans-unit.source: The second rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the specified rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 傳回兩個指定之矩形的交集。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of the two rectangles, or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> if no intersection exists.
trans-unit.target: 兩個矩形的交集，如果沒有交集則為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Intersect%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Rect%29> method to find the intersection of two rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Intersect%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Rect%29>方法來尋找兩個矩形的交集。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified rectangle intersects with the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的矩形是否與目前矩形交集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified rectangle intersects with the current rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的矩形與目前矩形交集則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.IntersectsWith%2A> method to determine if two rectangles intersect.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.IntersectsWith%2A>方法，以判斷兩個矩形是否相交。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the rectangle is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示矩形是否為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rectangle is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩形是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this property to test for zero area; a rectangle with zero area is not necessarily the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用這個屬性來測試為零的區域。具有零個區域的矩形不一定是<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>矩形。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得矩形左側的 X 軸值。

trans-unit.source: The x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左側的 X 軸值。

trans-unit.source: Getting this property is equivalent to getting the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性相當於取得<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定矩形左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is (0, 0).
The position of the top-left corner of the rectangle is equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的位置會等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure to specify the dimensions and location of a rectangle using XAML.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構，以指定的維度和使用 XAML 之矩形的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> is set on an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Location" /> 是在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形上設定。

trans-unit.source: Moves a rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的數量移動矩形。

trans-unit.source: A vector that specifies the horizontal and vertical amounts to move the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 向量，指定用來移動矩形的水平和垂直數量。

trans-unit.source: Moves the rectangle by the specified vector.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的向量移動矩形。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on an empty rectangle (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 為空的矩形上呼叫這個方法 (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 不允許。

trans-unit.source: Note that calling the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A> method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A>方法才會有作用，如果您可以變更<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>直接內容。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Rect> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Rect>是實值類型，如果您參考<xref:System.Windows.Rect>物件使用屬性或索引子，您會取得一份物件，而不是物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>對屬性或索引子參考，則編譯器會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A> on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A>屬性或索引子上不會變更基礎物件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Rect>參照為屬性或索引子，會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>修改它的欄位，然後指派<xref:System.Windows.Rect>回屬性或索引子。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%28System.Windows.Vector%29> method to change the position of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%28System.Windows.Vector%29>方法，以變更矩形的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is called on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The amount to move the rectangle horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 要水平移動矩形的數量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to move the rectangle vertically.
trans-unit.target: 要垂直移動矩形的數量。

trans-unit.source: Moves the rectangle by the specified horizontal and vertical amounts.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的水平和垂直數量移動矩形。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on an empty rectangle (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 為空的矩形上呼叫這個方法 (<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 不允許。

trans-unit.source: Note that calling the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A> method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A>方法才會有作用，如果您可以變更<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>直接內容。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Rect> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Rect>是實值類型，如果您參考<xref:System.Windows.Rect>物件使用屬性或索引子，您會取得一份物件，而不是物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更<xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>對屬性或索引子參考，則編譯器會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A> on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Offset%2A>屬性或索引子上不會變更基礎物件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Rect>參照為屬性或索引子，會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Rect>修改它的欄位，然後指派<xref:System.Windows.Rect>回屬性或索引子。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Transform%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Matrix%29> method to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure that results from applying a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> to an existing rectangle.

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that is exactly large enough to contain a given rectangle and a specified point or second rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形，這個矩形剛好可以包含指定的矩形和指定的點或第二個矩形。

trans-unit.source: The point to include.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的點。

trans-unit.source: Expands the current rectangle exactly enough to contain the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 將目前矩形展開為剛好可以包含指定的點。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Point%29> method to expand the current rectangle exactly enough to contain a given <xref:System.Windows.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Point%29>方法來展開目前的矩形剛好包含給定<xref:System.Windows.Point>。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to include.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Expands the current rectangle exactly enough to contain the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 將目前矩形展開為剛好可以包含指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Rect%29> method to expand the current rectangle exactly enough to contain the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Rect%29>方法包含指定的矩形剛好展開目前的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to include.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The point to include.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that is exactly large enough to include the specified rectangle and the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形，這個矩形剛好可以包含指定的矩形和指定的點。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that is exactly large enough to contain the specified rectangle and the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 矩形，剛好可以包含指定的矩形和指定的點。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Point%29> method to create a rectangle that is exactly large enough to contain a given rectangle and a given <xref:System.Windows.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Point%29>方法來建立剛好足夠包含給定的矩形的矩形和給定<xref:System.Windows.Point>。

trans-unit.source: The first rectangle to include.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的第一個矩形。

trans-unit.source: The second rectangle to include.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的第二個矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that is exactly large enough to contain the two specified rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形，這個矩形剛好可以包含兩個指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The resulting rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 產生的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Rect%29> method to create a rectangle that is exactly large enough to contain two given rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Union%28System.Windows.Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Rect%29>方法來建立剛好包含兩個指定的矩形的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A positive number that represents the width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形寬度的正數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> rectangle has a <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> of <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>矩形<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> rectangle is read-only; its <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A> cannot not be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>矩形是唯讀，則其<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>不變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure to specify the dimensions and location of a rectangle using XAML.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Rect>結構，以指定的維度和使用 XAML 之矩形的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use code to create a rectangle and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用程式碼建立矩形，並將它加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates how to find size and coordinate information about the new rectangle and render the information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> below the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何尋找新的矩形的大小和座標資訊和轉譯中的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>矩形下方。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Width" /> is set to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Width" /> 設為負數值。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Width" /> 是在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> 矩形上設定。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定矩形左側的 X 軸值。

trans-unit.source: The x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左側的 X 軸值。

trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性相當於取得<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Getting this property is equivalent to getting the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性相當於取得<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>屬性。
